original_text: So he told all his workers to meet with him. He also asked other workers to come, who did the same kind of work. He said to all these men, ‘Men, you know that our work has caused us to become rich.
korean_text: 그가 그 직공들과 그러한 영업하는 자들을 모아 이르되 여러분도 알거니와 우리의 풍족한 생활이 이 생업에 있는데

sentences.original_text: So he told all his workers
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 그의 모든 일꾼들에게 말했다

sentences.original_text: He also asked other workers to come
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또 다른 일꾼들에게 오라고 요청했다

sentences.original_text: who did the same kind of work
He said to all these men
that our work has caused us
